headline: Tesla Recasts Strategy as $1.56 Trillion Valuation Outpaces Auto Peers
summary: Tesla plans to end Model S and X production and invest $20 billion in autonomy, robotics, and energy, reshaping how analysts frame its valuation.

headline: Ford Just Took Another Charge Against Earnings. What It Means for the Stock.
summary: Ford Motor  is taking another charge against earnings.  Thursday, Ford disclosed a $600 million charge against earnings coming in the fourth quarter related to its employee retirement benefit.  It includes about $300 million for domestic plans and $300 million for overseas plans.

raw.headline: Ford Just Took Another Charge Against Earnings. What It Means for the Stock.
raw.summary: Ford Motor  is taking another charge against earnings.  Thursday, Ford disclosed a $600 million charge against earnings coming in the fourth quarter related to its employee retirement benefit.  It includes about $300 million for domestic plans and $300 million for overseas plans.

headline: Ford Energy Push Positions Ford Deeper Into Battery Storage Supply Chain
summary: Ford Motor (NYSE:F) has launched a dedicated battery energy storage systems business called Ford Energy. Lisa Drake has been appointed president of the new unit, focusing on energy storage and advanced battery production. Ford plans to repurpose its BlueOval SK Kentucky plant for battery energy storage system production as part of a major investment plan. For you as an investor, this moves Ford beyond its traditional role as an automaker and deeper into the broader clean energy supply...

headline: Ford to record $600 million pretax pension charge in fourth quarter
summary: Ford will report a pretax charge of $600 million in its fourth quarter results due to adjustments to employee pension plans and other postretirement benefits.

headline: New cars are increasingly becoming a luxury amid K-shaped economy concerns
summary: The market has increasingly been pricing millions of Americans out of the new-vehicle market, including by cutting entry-level vehicle lines such as small cars.

raw.headline: New cars are increasingly becoming a luxury amid K-shaped economy concerns

headline: Tesla Reorients From Premium EVs To Optimus Robots And xAI Future
summary: Tesla is shifting away from Model S and Model X production to focus on mass manufacturing its Optimus humanoid robots, repurposing its California factory for this new line. The company is expanding its autonomous technology efforts and committing $2b to Elon Musk's AI startup xAI. Rumors are circulating about a potential merger between Tesla and either SpaceX or xAI, which could reshape the group structure around AI, robotics, and autonomy. Tesla, NasdaqGS:TSLA, is trading at $416.56, with...

headline: Ford warns Wall Street it will take a $600 million pre-tax loss in Q4
summary: In a government filing late Jan. 29, Ford said it expects to take a $600 million pre-tax loss in 4 related to its pension and other retirement plans.

raw.headline: Ford warns Wall Street it will take a $600 million pre-tax loss in Q4
raw.summary: In a government filing late Jan. 29, Ford said it expects to take a $600 million pre-tax loss in 4 related to its pension and other retirement plans.
